movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates
movie.language: English, French, German, Swedish, Italian, Russian
movie.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat, expecting to be married to a rich claimant by her mother, falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
movie.title: Titanic
